properties.name: tc.providers.update-interval
properties.description: Interval in millis between provider status(UP/DOWN) update, when someone is viewing page

properties.name: tc.providers.min-update-interval
properties.description: How frequent in milliseconds can status update be invoked, whether manual or automatic controlled by tc.providers.update-interval

properties.name: tc.providers.default
properties.description: Name of defualt provider. For now two certainly available names are: thepiratebay.org and automatic
